pageSetting.title: 行员利润明细表

attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz

select.isEqual: select tjrq,jgmc,hydh,hymc,ftpsr,zbjsr,tqzqlxhk,lxzc,(ftpsr+zbjsr+tqzqlxhk-lxzc) hj from( select yj.tjrq,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc,jg.jgdh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end) ftpsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end) zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end) tqzqlxhk, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end) lxzc from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_hy_all yj on gl.zbdh=yj.zbdh and gl.bz=yj.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yj.sdbs='$sdbs$' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc order by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh desc ) z

select tjrq,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lxsr,ftpzc,jzzb,yswslxxz,(lxsr-ftpzc-jzzb-yswslxxz) hj from( select yj.tjrq,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc,jg.jgdh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end) lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end) ftpzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end) jzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end) yswslxxz from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_hy_all yj on gl.zbdh=yj.zbdh and gl.bz=yj.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yj.sdbs='$sdbs$' and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc order by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh desc ) z

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select tjrq,jgmc,hydh,hymc,ftpsr,zbjsr,tqzqlxhk,lxzc,(ftpsr+zbjsr+tqzqlxhk-lxzc) hj from( select yj.tjrq,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc,jg.jgdh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end) ftpsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end) zbjsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end) tqzqlxhk, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end) lxzc from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_hy_all yj on gl.zbdh=yj.zbdh and gl.bz=yj.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yj.sdbs='$sdbs$' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1001 group by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc order by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh desc ) z
select tjrq,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lxsr,ftpzc,jzzb,yswslxxz,(lxsr-ftpzc-jzzb-yswslxxz) hj from( select yj.tjrq,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc,jg.jgdh, sum(case when gl.pxxh=1 then yj.zbz else 0 end) lxsr, sum(case when gl.pxxh=2 then yj.zbz else 0 end) ftpzc, sum(case when gl.pxxh=3 then yj.zbz else 0 end) jzzb, sum(case when gl.pxxh=4 then yj.zbz else 0 end) yswslxxz from khdx_zbbbgl gl inner join yjzb_hy_all yj on gl.zbdh=yj.zbdh and gl.bz=yj.bz inner join khdx_hy hy on yj.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and yj.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join table (FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on qxhy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and yj.tjrq=$tjrq$ and yj.sdbs='$sdbs$' and hy.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) and gl.bbdh=1002 group by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,cy.hydh,hy.hymc order by yj.tjrq,jg.jgdh desc ) z ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key,dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZBSDBS' and dmz in('5','6','7') order by dmz
